input.sentences: my friend opened up a new store in town called buzz-a-rama .
it 's a race track but for rc cars .
they 're all small and magnetized to stay on the track .
it 's really popular among the younger children . he gives a briefing to them everytime they come .
the children are always excited about it | especially when they put their cars on the starting line .
output.sentences: So there's this really cool place I've been frequenting lately.
Basically, if you love cars and you love racing then you'll love it here because I do!
They have a track and these little cars you can race.
I probably spend about an hour or two meeting new people to race with.
It's literally the most fun activity in the world.
